title: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game ZoneX.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game ZoneX.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: In the dim light of the abandoned warehouse, the sleek silhouette of the weapon catches your eye. The compact submachine gun, adorned in a matte black finish, exudes an aura of precision and power. Its lightweight frame ensures swift maneuverability, making it the perfect companion in close-quarters combat. With an extended magazine, it promises relentless firepower, ready to unleash a hailstorm of bullets at a moment's notice. As you grip the sturdy polymer handle, a rush of adrenaline courses through you. Will you wield it to dominate the battlefield, or will it become a burden in your hands? The choice is yours.
